4304500.name: SLUGMOUTH
4304500.description:
SLUGMOUTH is an fps rpg where you explore a post-apocalyptic overworld from an overhead perspective and fight through points of interest from a first person view. Bullets hit hard and survival demands careful resource management and tactical shooting.

Open-ended Sandbox

Explore an open world with 25+ unique areas to explore. Scavenge and take jobs to earn money you can use to buy weapons and gear. There's no clear path or main quest; you create your own story. As you play, you unlock more gear that you can start out with on your next character.

Punishing Gunfights

Gunplay is slow, difficult, and tactical. Cover is essential, and you need to conserve ammo. Enemies are quick to observe you, so you must plan your movement carefully and check corners.

Survive Harsh Conditions

Scavenge for food, water, and medicine to stay alive. Death is permanent, so tread carefully. As you learn and adapt, you'll gain skills and gear that help you eventually conquer the challenges the world has in store.
